mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.name tname,t.way,t.schedule,u.id uid,u.phone phone,u.email email,d.id did,d.name,d.disease FROM teacher t,sysuser u,demand d,orders o,parent p WHERE u.id=#{id} AND o.teacher_id=t.id AND p.userId=u.id AND o.demand_id=d.id AND o.parent_id=p.id AND (o.status_t=3 or o.status_t=15)

SELECT t.id,t.name tname,t.way,t.domain,t.question,t.object,t.experience_age experienceAge,t.schedule,u.id uid,u.phone phone,u.email email,u.gender gender,u.headimgurl headimgurl FROM teacher t,sysuser u WHERE t.id=#{teacherId} AND u.id=t.user_id

SELECT distinct t.id,t.name FROM teacher t,sysuser u,orders o,parent p WHERE u.openid=#{openid} AND o.teacher_id=t.id AND p.userId=u.id AND o.parent_id=p.id AND (o.status_t!=1 and o.status_t!=2 and o.status_t!=11 and o.status_t!=12 and o.status_t!=16)

SELECT t.id,t.name tname,t.way,u.id uid,u.phone,d.id did,d.name,d.disease,t.schedule FROM teacher t,sysuser u,demand d,orders o,parent p WHERE u.id=#{id} AND o.teacher_id=t.id AND p.userId=u.id AND o.demand_id=d.id AND o.parent_id=p.id AND (o.status_t=3 or o.status_t=15)
SELECT schedule FROM teacher WHERE user_id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE teacher set schedule=#{schedule} WHERE user_id=#{id}
